model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
I just tried this breathing exercise and it really helped me relax.
What kind of breathing exercise?
It's just a simple one, where you inhale for four seconds, hold your breath for seven seconds, and then exhale for eight seconds. I've been doing it every day for the past week and it's made such a difference.
That's really interesting. I've heard that breathing exercises can be really helpful for reducing stress and anxiety.
Yes, it definitely has helped me with that. Plus, it's something that I can easily do anywhere, whether I'm at home or out running errands.
That's great. It's always good to have a simple tool like that to help manage stress. 
Speaking of managing stress, remember a few years ago when I pushed your shoulder because I wanted you to accept me?
Oh yeah, I do remember that. That was a stressful time for both of us.

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'reminiscing past events', 'Related Summaries': 'Neighbors A and B recall past events like ordering pizza and discovering a park.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Neighbors B: That's really cool, I'm happy for you. Speaking of things we've learned, do you remember when you ordered that pizza for me a few years ago? ### Neighbors A: Yes, of course! What about it? ### Neighbors B: It was so thoughtful of you. I still remember how delicious it was. ### Neighbors A: I'm glad you enjoyed it. Although, looking back, I can't believe I ordered a large cheese pizza with extra sauce. That's so much cheese! ### Neighbors B: It was a lot, haha. Speaking of things that happened in the past, do you remember that time you pushed my shoulder because you wanted me to accept you? ### Neighbors A: Oh no, that was so embarrassing. I still cringe when I think about it. ### Neighbors B: Don't worry about it, it was a long time ago. Besides, we're good friends now, so it all worked out. ### Neighbors A: You're right. And hey, speaking of being friends, do you remember when we found that park a couple of years ago? That was such a great day. ### Neighbors B: Yes! We played frisbee and had a picnic. It was so much fun. ### Neighbors A: I miss those days sometimes. It feels like life was simpler back then.' }
```
